Interface RenderConfiguration

Represents a set of configuration options to control the graph renderer

Hierarchy

  • RenderConfigurationOptions
    • RenderConfiguration

Properties

autoBind

autoBind: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.autoBind

  • Defined in types.ts:249

If true, when nodes/edges are dynamically changed, the data will automatically be rebound to the renderer

backgroundColor

backgroundColor: ColorVector

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.backgroundColor

  • Defined in types.ts:97

The background color of the renderer

cameraAdjustmentMode

cameraAdjustmentMode: CameraAdjustmentMode

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.cameraAdjustmentMode

  • Defined in types.ts:244

The camera mode to use

cornerAxes

cornerAxes: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.cornerAxes

  • Defined in types.ts:102

If true, the axes will be shown in the corner

dataBounds

dataBounds: Maybe<Bounds>

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.dataBounds

  • Defined in types.ts:254

The known bounds of the graph, setting this can speed up rendering

drawAxes

drawAxes: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.drawAxes

  • Defined in types.ts:107

If true, the axes will be drawn

drawEdges

drawEdges: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.drawEdges

  • Defined in types.ts:112

If true, the edges will be drawn

drawNodes

drawNodes: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.drawNodes

  • Defined in types.ts:117

If true, the nodes will be drawn

edgeAlpha

edgeAlpha: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeAlpha

  • Defined in types.ts:122

The opacity to apply to the edges, 0 (fully transparent) -> 1 (fully opaque)

edgeAntialias

edgeAntialias: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeAntialias

  • Defined in types.ts:127

If true, edges will be antialiased

edgeConstantWidth

edgeConstantWidth: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeConstantWidth

  • Defined in types.ts:132

If true, edges will be drawn with a constant width, regardless of zoom

edgeCountHint

edgeCountHint: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeCountHint

  • Defined in types.ts:229

Provides a hint to the renderer about how many edges are expected so data buffers can be preallocated with the optimal size, default = 10000

edgeDepthWrite

edgeDepthWrite: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeDepthWrite

  • Defined in types.ts:137

If true, edges closer to the camera will occlude further edges

edgeFilteredInSaturation

edgeFilteredInSaturation: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeFilteredInSaturation

  • Defined in types.ts:142

The saturation of edges which are in the filtered set

edgeFilteredOutSaturation

edgeFilteredOutSaturation: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeFilteredOutSaturation

  • Defined in types.ts:147

The saturation of edges which are not in the filtered set

edgeMaxWidth

edgeMaxWidth: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeMaxWidth

  • Defined in types.ts:152

The maximum width of the edges

edgeMinWidth

edgeMinWidth: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.edgeMinWidth

  • Defined in types.ts:157

The minimum width of the edges

height

height: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.height

  • Defined in types.ts:239

The height of the canvas, default = 500

hideDeselected

hideDeselected: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.hideDeselected

  • Defined in types.ts:162

If true, non-selected vertices will be hidden

hideEdgesOnMove

hideEdgesOnMove: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.hideEdgesOnMove

  • Defined in types.ts:167

If true, edges will be hidden while the user is panning/zooming

hideNodesOnMove

hideNodesOnMove: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.hideNodesOnMove

  • Defined in types.ts:172

If true, nodes will be hidden while the user is panning/zooming

hoverHighlightColor

hoverHighlightColor: ColorVector

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.hoverHighlightColor

  • Defined in types.ts:177

The default color to highlight nodes when they are hovered

interpolationTime

interpolationTime: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.interpolationTime

  • Defined in types.ts:182

The amount of time to transition between 3d mode and 2d mode

is3D

is3D: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.is3D

  • Defined in types.ts:187

If true, the graph should be rendered in 3d

nodeCountHint

nodeCountHint: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.nodeCountHint

  • Defined in types.ts:223

Provides a hint to the renderer about how many nodes are expected so data buffers can be preallocated with the optimal size, default = 10000

nodeFilteredIds

nodeFilteredIds: undefined | string[]

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.nodeFilteredIds

  • Defined in types.ts:192

The set of filtered node ids

nodeFilteredInSaturation

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.nodeFilteredInSaturation

  • Defined in types.ts:197

The saturation of nodes which are in the filtered set

nodeFilteredOutSaturation

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.nodeFilteredOutSaturation

  • Defined in types.ts:202

The saturation of nodes which are not in the filtered set

nodeMaxRadius

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.nodeMaxRadius

  • Defined in types.ts:207

The maximum radius of the nodes

nodeMinRadius

nodeMinRadius: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.nodeMinRadius

  • Defined in types.ts:212

The minimum radius of the nodes

nodeOutline

nodeOutline: boolean

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.nodeOutline

  • Defined in types.ts:217

If true, nodes will be drawn with an outline

width

width: number

Inherited from RenderConfigurationOptions.width

  • Defined in types.ts:234

The width of the canvas, default = 500
